title: Note: Out of thetotal premium amount collected under theseRegulation,2/3shall be kept in a separate account to be utilized as shelter fund for the State of Maharashtraand 1/3 shall be deposited at the Office of the Deputy Director of Town Planning, Greater Mumbai
